title: In the Kitchen with Harry Hamlin
overview: In the Kitchen with Harry Hamlin is a cooking show with a unique combination of cooking, dinner party, and documentary … all with a dash of comedy and ‘feels' along the way. Shot in Hamlin's home kitchen, the series puts Hamlin's passion for cooking and Guilbault's expertise on full display as they share favorite recipes, practical kitchen tips and secrets for a successful dinner party that exudes casual elegance, welcoming new guests into the Hamlin kitchen each week.
